Package data

Class Anime

java.lang.Object
data.Anime
public class Anime extends Object
Defines an Anime object as the fundamental piece of the AnimeLog program. In this program, two anime cannot have the same name and year
Author:
Hunter Pruitt

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class

    Anime.Language
    Indicates the language used in the anime
    static enum 
    Anime.Type
    Indicates whether the content is a series, or a special.

  • Constructor Details

    • Anime

      public Anime(String title, int year, int count, Anime.Language lan, Anime.Type type, boolean finished, boolean dropped, String director, String studio, String notes)
      Constructor for an anime object, used when reading in data
      Parameters:
      title - name of entry
      year - release year for first episode
      count - number of episodes watched
      lan - language
      type - series or special
      finished - if the user finished watching
      dropped - if the user stopped watching
      director -
      studio - producers of the show
      notes - personal notes about the entry
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if passed bad parameters

  • Method Details

    • sortsBeforeTitleFocus

      public boolean sortsBeforeTitleFocus(Anime otherAnime)
      Compares two anime for sorting using alphabetical order (and year if both titles match) This method indicates if this anime precedes the other. Sorting is not case-sensitive and numbers/symbols come before letters
      Parameters:
      otherAnime - anime to be compared to
      Returns:
      boolean indicator of if this anime comes before the parameter anime
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if passed an anime identical to this

    • sortsBeforeYearFocus

      public boolean sortsBeforeYearFocus(Anime otherAnime)
      Alternate sorting based method. Indicates if this anime precedes the anime parameter based on year comparison and then alphabetical precedence
      Parameters:
      otherAnime - Anime to be compared against
      Returns:
      boolean indicator of if this anime comes before the parameter anime
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if passed an anime identical to this
